definitions.definition: A former coal-mining valley in South Wales .
A river in Rhondda Cynon Taf borough county borough, South Wales with two main tributaries, Rhondda Fawr and Rhondda Fach.

main_definition: A former coal-mining valley in South Wales .
secondary_definitions: A river in Rhondda Cynon Taf borough county borough, South Wales with two main tributaries, Rhondda Fawr and Rhondda Fach.
